com.openxc.sources

Class BaseVehicleDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.openxc.sources.BaseVehicleDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataPipeline.Operator, VehicleDataSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationSource, ContextualVehicleDataSource, RemoteListenerSource, TestSource

    public abstract class BaseVehicleDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements VehicleDataSource
    A common parent for all vehicle data sources. This class encapsulates functionality common to most data sources. It accepts and stores a SourceCallback reference (required by the VehicleDataSource interface) and implements a handleMessage(VehicleMessage) method for subclass to call with each new message, regardless of its origin.

      • isConnected

        public abstract boolean isConnected()
        Description copied from interface: VehicleDataSource
        Return true if the data source is actively connected to its target, be it a USB endpoint, a Bluetooth channel, a trace file, etc. The source is capable of providing new vehicle data. Returns true if connected, false otherwise.
        Specified by:
        isConnected in interface VehicleDataSource

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Clear the callback so no further updates are sent. Subclasses should be sure to call super.stop() so they also stop sending updates when killed by a user.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface VehicleDataSource
